monogr.title: The Crown of the Year: The “Propria” or Changing Prayers and Hymns of the Holy Qurbana for the Sundays and Important Feast Days of the Liturgical Year according to the East Syriac or Chaldeo-Indian Liturgical heritage

body.bibl: Pathikulangara, Varghese. The Crown of the Year: The “Propria” or Changing Prayers and Hymns of the Holy Qurbana for the Sundays and Important Feast Days of the Liturgical Year According to the East Syriac or Chaldeo-Indian Liturgical Heritage. 2 vols. Kottayam: Denha Services, 1997.
